author: geekship
title: SOIL: E-Commerce legal templates
description: Regional E-Commerce regulations can be difficult, especially with regard to crypto ecosystems. Legislators don't understand auditability.
solution: Create a templates for E-Commerce with regional regulations built in, with emphasis on auditability and compliance.
experience:
